title: Too Many Issues
itunes:title: Too Many Issues
description:
Good morning Steve Shirley Nephew Tommy Carla I listen to your show faithfully every morning because it gives me the inspiration I need to start my day. I love the way God truly gets the glory, first and foremost. On the issues I am emailing about my wife and I have been together for 28 years and married for 19. Our problem is our grown children twenty seven and twenty five.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
